titles.title: Community Development Flexibility Act
A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase the maximum amount of community development assistance that may be used for public service activities.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15787)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 11/16/1993--Introduced. Community Development Flexibility Act - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase the maximum amount of community development block grant assistance that may be used for public service activities.
